analyzed: saptavidha anuttara stotram
namaḥ śrī lokanāthāya
amita ruci śiraḥ stham padma patra āyata akṣam
durita kṛta vināśam moha māyā āhita akṣam
kara dhṛta kanaka abjam lokapāla eka dakṣam
praṇamita śirasā aham naumi tam lokanātham
aruṇa varuṇa śobhā bodhi vijñāna hetum
maṇi maya mukuṭam saṃsāraka ambhodhi setum
kṛta manasija nāśam bodhisattva ādi ketum
praṇamita śirasā aham naumi tam lokanātham
sarasija kṛta vāsam dūra kandarpa pāśam
pūrṇa candra prakāśam
su kṛta jana vilāsam koṭi sūrya avabhāsam
praṇamita śirasā aham naumi tam lokanātham
urasi vihita nāgam mocita aśeṣa rāgam
bhava jaladhi vibhāgam mokṣa saukhya eka mārgam
pratapita kanaka aṅgam bodhi bodha eka rāgam
praṇamita śirasā aham naumi tam lokanātham
su lalita phaṇi rājam kīrṇita ācā abhirājam
pramudita vali rājam pālita amartya rājam
praṇamita śirasā aham naumi tam lokanātham
dhṛta madhukara rūpam kṣupti pāsā anta kūpam
su carita haya rūpam siṃhalā danta bhūpam
aguru surabhi dhūpam dhārita aśeṣa rūpam
praṇamita śirasā aham naumi tam lokanātham
trividha vidhṛta pāpam me harantam tri tāpam
pratidinam iti jāpam devacakre vilāpam
niraya bhaya kalāpam bhedaka ajñāna cāpam
praṇamita śirasā aham naumi tam lokanātham
vihita śubha janānām mukti tāpa udyatānām
vigalita kaluṣāṇām bhakti pūjā ratānām
vara kuśala samūham saṃprapede sva bhaktyā
praṇamita śirasā aham naumi tam lokanātham
daśa bala kṛta siddhim saṃvadhe buddha bodhim
janana maraṇa bhītam māra pāśa abhinītam
manasi malina vṛtte pūrita ajñāna vitte
praṇamita śirasā aham naumi tam lokanātham
pravara sugata ratnam dharmakāyam saṃsaṃgham
kṣaraṇam iha prayāmi kārita anaṅga bhaṅgam
pramudita manasā āptam bodhi lābha eka yatnam
praṇamita śirasā aham naumi tam lokanātham
yat saptadhā arcana yutam sarasā ati hṛdyam
saukhyāvatī gamana mārga karam tu sadyas
stutvā lokagurum muni īśvaram imam sarva artha siddhi pradam
yat puṇyam samupārjitam vrajatu tat puṇyena saukhyāvatīm
loka kleśa haram su durjaya varam jitvā pramukta amalam
śrīmat āryāvalokiteśvarasya saptavidhānuttararastotram samāptam
